attributes.action: Let the English people have a vote on Devolution for Enlgand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I call on the PM to let the people of England have a vote on Devolution from the rest of the UK. 
As at the moment Part Devolution for Scotland, Wales & North Ireland works for them, but not for England due to the unfair way Labour made the law, as MP's from rest the UK can vote on English matters, which has been used by this government many time already.
Therefore with a fair vote by the English people on their own country for Devolution from the rest of the UK.  To bring back power to English Parliament for England. That English MP's can vote on English Law and matters arising.
The only Vote to be held by the whole of UK, would be defence & foreign affairs and EU.
